ygData.subject: Re: New Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: I like the idea - but can ICQ be used (efficiently) for a large chat?  I ve only used it for at most 4-5 people.  Anyone have experience with this. Also -
ygData.messageBody:
I like the idea - but can ICQ be used (efficiently) for a large chat? I've
only used it for at most 4-5 people. Anyone have experience with this.

Also - having done large group things like this in other multi-player
games - I'd STRONGLY recommend not doing anything without an agenda worked
out in advance...

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: <eqbards-owner@onelist.com>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 02, 1999 4:11 PM
Subject: [eqbards] New Survey


> From: eqbards-owner@...
>
> Hello,
>
> There is a new survey for the eqbards community.
>
> Since the list has grown to over 150 members with some great threads, I
was wondering if anyone would be interested in an ICQ chat event. Please
give me your answers so we can get this together.
> I need three answers
> yes or no
> what day
> what time
>
> thanks
> Torenithus Legendmaker
> Bard of Qeynos
>
> ----
>
> Possible answers are:
>
> o Not Interested in a chat session
> o Yes once a week
> o Yes every other week
> o Yes once a month
> o Yes every other month
> o On a weekday
> o On the weekend
> o In the day
> o In the evening
> o At night
>
>
> To vote, please visit the following web page:
>
> http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/eqbards
>
>
> Thanks!
>
> eqbards Owner
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Tired of empty chat rooms and out of date bulletin boards?
> http://www.ONElist.com
> ONElist: Making the Internet Intimate
>
